name: Dungeon Philosopher
description:
For too long, the dungeons have been wracked with chaos and violence, with every newcomer slaughtered on entry. You dream of a dungeon filled with peace and joy, and free from the bloodstains of humanity.

It is your humble quest to convince the dungeon realm of your dream, and usher in a new age of pacifism and prosperity.

Made for GameOff2018, a roguelike bullet-hell hybrid.
